summary: DT: THE CONTACT STATES VEHICLE DIED WHILE PULLING INTO  DRIVEWAY. THE VEHICLE WOULD NOT RESTART. THE VEHICLE WAS TOWED TO AN INDEPENDENT REPAIR SHOP. THE REPAIRMAN INFORMED HER THAT THE ENGINE FAILED DUE TO SLUDGE BUILD UP. SHE CONTACTED MANUFACTURER,THAT  AND THEY REQUESTED SHE BRING  VEHICLE TO AN AUTHORIZED DEALERSHIP FOR REPAIRS. *AK
